name: Meryl
info: Cold, aloof, and indifferent. She doesn't show any emotions at all. It's not that she's emotionless, she just refuses to build relationships with others.
description:
A senior Hykros Executor with no record of birth or age. According to the information available, Meryl excelled at S-level missions with her sword and combat skills, ascending from an ordinary officer to a senior Executor in just a few years.
She keeps an indifferent attitude toward everything, and no one knows what's really on her mind. It doesn't help that she has no mercy against her enemies, so people keep their distance from her whenever possible.
The database of Executors shows that Meryl has a close twin brother, but there are no records of this brother anywhere.

skills.name: Heavy Cleave
skills.description: While on the ground, swing a greatsword to attack 4 times in a row. First Attack: Deal damage equal to 72.9% of ATK plus 4 and knock the target back a short distance. Second Attack: Deal damage equal to 60.1% of ATK plus 3 and knock the target back a short distance. Third Attack: Deal damage equal to 105.4% of ATK plus 6 and knock the target back a short distance. Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to 156% of ATK plus 8, strongly launch the target, then launch them upon landing.

skills.name: Aerial Strike
skills.description: While airborne or after jumping once, use normal attack to attack 4 times in a row. First Attack: Deal damage equal to 106.5% of ATK plus 6. Second Attack: Deal damage equal to 87.5% of ATK plus 5. Third Attack: Deal damage equal to 156% of ATK plus 8. Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to 140.5% of ATK plus 7 and deliver a knockdown, launch the target upon landing.

skills.name: Rising Slash
skills.description: After the third normal attack, hold normal attack to trigger Rising Slash. Upon hit, strongly suspend the target and go airborne, dealing damage equal to 64.3%of ATK plus 3.

skills.name: Sneak Attack
skills.description: Approach the enemy from behind while crouching, then use normal attack to use Sneak Attack, dealing damage equal to 570% of ATK plus 30.

skills.name: Whirlwind
skills.description: While standing still or moving, tap and hold normal attack to trigger Whirlwind, dealing damage equal to 132.8% of ATK plus 7 every 0.5 seconds to the target. Grant hitstun immunity while in use.

skills.name: Devastate
skills.description: Tap normal attack during the short perfect dodge window (tap an arrow button before dodging) to trigger Devastate. Deal damage equal to 65.9% of ATK plus 3 each hit and launch targets.

skills.name: Crescent Slash
skills.description: Use normal attack during the short period after dodging to trigger Crescent Slash. Swing the greatsword to unleash sword auras forward, each dealing damage equal to 49.6% of ATK plus 3.

skills.name: Blizzard
skills.description: Swing the greatsword to launch sword auras forward, each dealing damage equal to 141.7% of ATK plus 7 and dealing increasing damage of 5% with each hit. Immune to control effects while active. Cooldown: 30 seconds.

skills.name: Frost Barrier
skills.description: When weapon charge is full or Phantasia is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, remove all debuffs from the Wanderer and smash the ground to form a barrier, dealing damage equal to 503.2% of ATK plus 26 to nearby enemies, suspending the targets. This reduces their speed by 50% and stops them from dodging or jumping. The barrier lasts 5 seconds and blocks projectiles.

weapon_type.name: Ice Shell
weapon_type.description: When the weapon is fully charged, the next attack will strongly freeze targets for 2 seconds and leave them frostbitten for 6 seconds. Breaking the ice shell deals damage equal to 151% of ATK. While frostbitten, the target's weapon charge rate is reduced by 50%.

advancement: Increase shatter by 15% and restore 10% of HP after shattering the target's shield.
Increase the current weapon's base HP growth by 16%.
Upon switching to the weapon, gain an Ice Shield equal to 10% of Max HP. Cooldown: 20 seconds. The Ice Shield lasts up to 10 seconds.
Increase the current weapon's base HP growth by 32%.
Increase damage and shatter by 50% while the shield is active.
Upon switching to the weapon, gain an Ice Shield equal to 20% of Max HP and immunity to being controlled when shield is active. Cooldown: 20 seconds. The Ice Shield lasts up to 10 seconds.

traits.name: Cool Rose
traits.description: Reduce frost damage received by Meryl by 20%, gain immunity to the frostbitten effect, and reduce duration of being frozen by 50%.

traits.name: Frosted
traits.description: Reduce frost damage received by Meryl by 25%, gain immunity to the frostbite effect, and reduce the duration of being frozen by 50%. The air around Meryl becomes cold, freezing the water around her.
